message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, the product is worth significantly more to me than that. Could you consider something closer to $18,000?
I understand you think the product is worth more to you, but I'm still interested in buying it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $14,000. Can you consider that?
